sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/TourDetails.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import avatar from '../../src/assets/images/avatar.jpg' const TourDetail = () => { const {id} = useParams() const tour = tourData.find(tour=>tour.id===id) const {photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour; const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews); const options = {day:"numeric",} return (

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( "Not rated" ) : ( ({reviews.length}) )} {address}
{city} ₹{price}/per persion {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/*========== tour reviews section ============*/}

Reviews ({reviews?.length}reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{ reviews?.map(reviews=>(
Ankit

{new Date('02-9-2024').toLocaleDateString( "en-US",options )}

)) }
{/*========== tour reviews section ============*/}
) } export default TourDetail
